extendedInfo.description: [UPDATE 8/26 - Cloudskipper 2.0 is in development w/ updated UI for Jellybean / XXHDPI devices.]CLOUDSKIPPER MUSIC PLAYERLibrary Features- left & right swipe navigation- create and edit playlists- delete tracks, albums, etc.- large album artwork- persistent mini-player- intuitive UI- Create ringtones from songs in 2 clicksSocial Sharing- share on Facebook & Twitter- easily add friends to your message- for Facebook weâll notify your added friends by posting on their wall- for Twitter add their @name to your post- automatically add YouTube video to post- preview YouTube video before sending- 50+ preset messagesMini-Player- easy access & always available- higher buttons: great for thumbs!- share button - share what's playing with friends- playlist count w/ link to list- progress bar & remaining time- album artwork, track name, and artist- play/pause, rewind, fast forward- click to open Audio Player- most advanced mini-player view on the marketAudio Player- on-screen volume slider (optional)- thumb-happy UI- controls fade out when not in use- hide status bar (optional)- loop & shuffle- playback scrubber- large album artwork- Equalizer (EQ), Bass Boost, Reverb, and Virtualizer (Android 2.3+)Lock Screen- playback controls controls- Camera & LED flashlight- on-screen volume slider (optional)- silent / vibrate toggle- playlist count- album artwork, track name, and artist- play/pause, rewind, fast forward- 24 hr clock (optional)- most advanced player lock screen on the marketWidget- single row mini-player- Share tracks with one click- more versions coming soonAbout UsWe're Mike and Radley, a couple of music fans who build media players for a living. We wanted to build the most fun, efficient, hassle free music player we could imagine.We're fanatical about bugs and crashes! We receive a notification for any crash/freeze and jump to fix it. The update goes up usually within minutes, so please keep an eye out for updates.

reviews.title: 2.0 waiting
reviews.comment: App very good though app over a year old with 4.1 and 4.2 from Google announced since! Personally the notification center would be better with an musical note icon instead of a plane (perhaps app option)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My favorite music player, hand\'s down!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried other mp3 apps like double twist and winamp, but they just don\'t work as well. Free EQ,  great lock screen playback, and you can share what you\'re listening to a  post on Twitter and Facebook. Also imports album covers from album art apps. Double twist wouldn\'t and you have to pay for the EQ.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cloudskipper is great!
reviews.comment: Great app. Simple interface. Does exactly what I want: be a rock solid and uncluttered music player.
reviews.author: Earl Taylor

reviews.title: Amazing App
reviews.comment: It might be OLD but its very cool player - lock option is good...keep up the great work..
reviews.author: Ameen Shariff

reviews.title: Best music app
reviews.comment: LOVE this app, by far the best. But, to get 5* id love to see it have a music tag editor and also when playing music, have the option to add to a playlist on the \'now playing\' screen instead of having to scroll down to find it in the \'all songs\' section. Apart from that this app is perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.comment: Better than all the rest. This is exactly what I been looking for, and I ain\'t even know it. Looks awesome, amazing lock screen wow... Great job developers!
reviews.author: Randy Jefferson

reviews.title: prasad
reviews.comment: This is very good music player with good equalizer effect and nice look. But still some bugs on my sony WML.  The bass boost and scrolling songs some times not reacting with my touch.  Other wise this very good player.  am waiting for the updates for bug fix. Better than some paid players.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best yet!
reviews.comment: Love my music, this is so user friendly, much easier to navigate than others I\'ve tried.
reviews.author: Jase Kingsbury

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Love it looks and plays beautiful. Would be nice with a drop down or side swipe to get to playlist. On the EVO LTE, same as ONE X it is by far the best player. And yes that is what I\'m talkin bout (pun intended)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s almost perfect.
reviews.comment: The full screen album art is a big plus & the screen lock navigation is ideal for work environments. However, I suggest allowing users to share music via email as well as networking sites (I\'ve already acquired the music) and work on  perfecting the screen lock clock, it displays the time that the phone was last unlocked versus the ideal current time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and very reliable. I love this music player. 5 stars!
reviews.author: Bilge Tanrikut

reviews.title: Best option so far
reviews.comment: I have tried many music players and this one is the #1 i use. Would be nice for the developer to keep up this software!
reviews.author: Renee Jacobs

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The only music player that is a non-itunes friendly... I love that it easily adapts on the cover arts you downloaded... However there are still bugs that need to be remove that\'s why I rated it 4 Stars
reviews.author: Div Sarmiento

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: working ok (SGS3 4.1.2), but could be better. Looking forward to 2013 changes and updates. Still my favorite music player.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Music Player
reviews.comment: like that u can make music louder but album art doesnt always show up. and the equalizer keeps turning on even though ive ssitchd it off its making my music sound funny so im uninstalling till it gets fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AMAZING MUSIC PLAYER!
reviews.comment: much better than default player by a long shot. the only thing that is keeping me from rating it 5 out of 5 is: (1) using equalizer causes songs to skip and sound a little weird (2) you cannot alphabetize a playlist (3) you cannot fast forward/pause/rewind currently playing songs from drop down android bar  please fix these above problems soon they are rather annoying
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but don\'t work work ICS
reviews.comment: Randomly the widget works but when i click the widget to open the app to change tunes it force closes every time. Once this is fixed it\'ll be a 5 star app for sure, it was before the update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Love this player and i would make it as my default daily player but why the EQ are not available?Plus it would be great if the player display the album art with styles!!LOVE THIS!! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovin\' this app...
reviews.comment: ...so far so good. It\'s neat, great sound plus a pretty decent eq as well.  Good work Team!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Taking bck 1 star
reviews.comment: It freezes sometimes(mostly in morning) n have to restart it, otherwise default player also doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User
